sections.heading: Trial, defined.A trial is a judicial examination of the issues, whether of law or of fact in an action
sections.text: SourceR.S.1867, Code § 279, p. 440;R.S.1913, § 7842;C.S.1922, § 8786;C.S.1929, § 20-1103;R.S.1943, § 25-1103.AnnotationsHearing on a motion to dissolve an attachment is a trial. J. R. Watkins Co. v
